name: @open-dy/node-server-sdk
author: douyincloud@bytedance.com

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && rm -rf dist/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo

readme:
# @open-dy/node-server-sdk
抖音云 node 服务端sdk
## 安装
```
yarn add @open-dy/node-server-sdk
```

## 使用方式
```
import { dySDK }  from '@open-dy/node-server-sdk';
const database = dySDK.database();
const res = await database.collection('todos').get();
```
